title: दुर्गा द्वात्रिंशन्नामावलिः
subtitle2: 32 Names of Goddess Durga from Durga Saptashati

verses.meaning: Durga - The reliever of difficulties. Durgartishamani - Who pacifies all sufferings. Durgapadvinivarini - Dispeller of difficult adversities. Durgamachchhedini - Who cuts down all difficulties. Durgasadhini - Who accomplishes difficult tasks. Durganashini - The destroyer of all difficulties.

Durgatoddharini - Who uplifts from difficulties. Durganihantri - Who destroys difficulties completely. Durgamapaha - Who removes all obstacles. Durmamagyanada - Who bestows knowledge that overcomes difficulties. Durgadaityalokadavanala - Who is like fire that burns the world of demonic difficulties.

Durgama - The mother of difficulties (who controls them). Durgamaloka - Who perceives all difficulties. Durgamatmaswarupini - Whose very nature transcends difficulties. Durgamargaprada - Who shows the path through difficulties. Durgamavidya - The supreme knowledge about overcoming difficulties. Durgamashrita - The refuge in difficulties.

Durgamagyanasamsthana - The abode of knowledge that removes difficulties. Durgamadhyanabhasini - Whose meditation shines brilliantly even in difficulties. Durgamoha - Who deludes difficulties. Durgamaga - Who resolves all difficulties. Durgamarthaswarupini - The embodiment of the ultimate purpose beyond difficulties.

Durgamasurasamhantri - The slayer of demons representing difficulties. Durgamayudhadharini - Bearer of weapons against difficulties. Durgamangi - Who refines and purifies difficulties. Durgamata - Who is beyond all difficulties. Durgamya - Who is difficult to attain (the supreme goal). Durgameshwari - The empress who rules over all difficulties.

verses.sanskrit:
दुर्गभीमा दुर्गभामा दुर्गभा दुर्गदारिणी।
नामावलिमिमां यस्तु दुर्गाया मम मानवः॥
verses.transliteration:
durgabhīmā durgabhāmā durgabhā durgadāriṇī।
nāmāvalimim āṃ yastu durgāyā mama mānavaḥ॥
verses.meaning: Durgabhima - Who is terrible to difficulties. Durgabhama - The radiant lady who illuminates difficulties. Durgabha - The light that dispels the darkness of difficulties. Durgadarini - Who tears apart all difficulties. One who recites this garland of 32 names of Durga with devotion...

verses.sanskrit:
पठेत् श्रद्धासमन्वितः सर्वदुःखातिगो भवेत्।
नामैतत्परमं दुर्गाया कीर्तयेन्नरः॥
verses.transliteration:
paṭhet śraddhāsamanvitaḥ sarvaduḥkhātigo bhavet।
nāmaitatparamaṃ durgāyā kīrtayennara ḥ॥
verses.meaning: Recites with faith and devotion becomes free from all sorrows. One who chants these supreme names of Durga regularly...

verses.sanskrit:
यः पठेत्स्तोत्रमेतदन्यदपि वा स्तोत्रमुत्तमम्।
तस्य प्रसादात्सकलान् कामान् समवाप्नुयात्॥
verses.transliteration:
yaḥ paṭhetstotrametadanyadapi vā stotramuttamam।
tasya prasādātsakalān kāmān samavāpnuyāt॥
verses.meaning: Whoever recites this supreme stotra or any other excellent hymn to the Goddess, by Her grace attains the fulfillment of all desires and is protected from all difficulties and dangers.
